title: Love Came Softly: A Journey of the Heart
description: This book describes the journey that Love, the Person took me on. It's sad and funny and quirky and triumphant! It's our journey as humans if we let Love in. It will make you laugh and cry and nod in recognition. It will create pathways of healing and hope and hopefully reawaken your connection to Love ITself who waits patiently to be invited in.
author: Luce D'Amore
